title: A sermon preach'd at the funeral of John Melford ... who dyed (aged eighteen years) the 21st day of June, through the sad occasion of a fall from a horse, and was buried ... the 27th day of the same month, 1692 / by Tho. Easton ...
author: Easton, Thomas, b. 1661 or 2.
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
